feed.title: Hardcoded seeds, DNS seeds and Darknet nodes

entry.title: Hardcoded seeds, DNS seeds and Darknet nodes
entry.summary: The inquiry raises a pertinent question regarding the `getaddrinfo` function's ability to interpret NULL encodings across various supported platforms. This technical question underscores the importance of understanding platform compatibility and the behavior of network programming functions, particularly in how they handle specific encoding schemes like NULL encodings. The discussion serves as a critical examination of cross-platform support in network programming, highlighting the need for thorough testing and documentation to ensure broad compatibility and functionality of programming languages and their standard libraries when dealing with internet addresses and network communication.
